title: Smart Data Models - SvPowerFlow
description: Adapted from CIM data models. State variable for power flow. Load convention is used for flow direction. This means flow out from the TopologicalNode into the equipment is positive.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SvPowerFlow

Terminal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The terminal associated with the power flow state variable. Default: None

p.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The active power flow. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a TopologicalNode (bus) into the conducting equipment. Default: 0.0

q.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The reactive power flow. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a TopologicalNode (bus) into the conducting equipment. Default: 0.0
